name: Carlos III y la difusión de la antigüedad
description: "Charles III of Spain and the antiquity" tells the story of how Charles III funded the excavations that discovered the ancient cities of Herculaneum and Pompeii, spreading the knowledge acquired throughout Europe and America.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 980, equivalent or better Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: Generic
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: Generic
